content: this tapestry crochet **mushroom potholder** is my latest addition to the farmhouse collection 1 it s the perfect hot pad pattern for your country-style kitchen it also makes a great present for all lovers of nature and woods you can also use the pattern to make blanket squares pillowcases wall hangings bags etc the pdf file includes written instructions and a color chart **materials** dk 3 light cotton yarn in 2 contrasting colors color a a and color b b 3 0-mm c/2 usa 11 uk hook tapestry needle **yarn & yardage** i used paintbox yarns cotton dk in the following colors and amounts a vanilla cream 408 50-55 yds / 45-50 m b coffee bean 411 30-35 yds / 27-32 m **size** 6 7 17 cm by 7 3 18 5 cm **gauge** 28 single_crochet for 26 row in 4 10 cm worked in single_crochet tapestry crochet **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/farmhouse-potholders-collection
